\author{\noindent Author 1,\textbf{ }\textit{Affiliation 1}\textbf{}\thanks{E-mail:\ author1@affiliation1.edu, author2@affiliation2.edu. Acknowledgements
here.}\textbf{}\\
Author 2, \textit{Affiliation 2}\textbf{}\\
}

\end{abstract}
